kpi.name: M8013C39

kpi_info.title: Number of rejected Signaling Connection Establishment Requests for mobile originating signaling
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the total number of rejected Signaling Connection Establishment Requests for establishment cause "mo-Signalling" irrespective of the rejection reason, which might be for example, lack of radio resources, overload or any other reason. UPDATED: The transmission of an RRCConnectionReject message (eNB -> UE) in case that this message is sent in response to the reception of the previous RRCConnectionRequest message (UE -> eNB) with EstablishmentCause set to "mo-Signalling" (3GPP TS 36.331).

kpi.kpi_alias: Number of rejected Signaling Connection Establishment Requests for mobile originating signaling
